name: Crop Failure
location: A Farmland hex of the GM’s choice. If there are no Farmlands in the kingdom, this event has no effect.
description: Pests, blight, or bad weather damage the harvest.

criticalSuccess.msg: You contain the damage from the crop failure without it impacting your kingdom’s resources.

success.msg: You contain the crop failure, but not before it impacts your kingdom. @gain1ConsumptionNextTurn

failure.msg: The crop failure wipes out entire fields. @gain1d4+1ConsumptionNextTurn

criticalFailure.msg: The crop failure wipes out entire fields. @gain1d4+1ConsumptionNextTurn. In addition, the crop failure is so devastating that the Farmland is destroyed.
